Name: MAC1
Description: I don’t like to have to do a lot of thinking.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC2
Description: I try to avoid situations that require thinking in depth about something.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC3
Description: I prefer to do something that challenges my thinking abilities rather than something that requires little thought.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC4
Description: I prefer complex to simple problems.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC5
Description: Thinking hard and for a long time about something gives me little satisfaction.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC6
Description: If I am misinformed by the news media, it is my own behavior that determines how soon I will learn credible information.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC7
Description: I am in control of the information I get from the news media.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC8
Description: When I am misinformed by the news media, I am to blame.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC9
Description: The main thing that affects my knowledge about the world is what I myself do.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC10
Description: If I pay attention to different sources of news, I can avoid being misinformed.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: MAC11
Description: If I take the right actions, I can stay informed.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: SMDS1
Description: I am looking for news about the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in social networks.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: SMDS2
Description: People who are part of my social networks disseminate information about the coronavirus (COVID-19).
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: SMDS3
Description: All news regarding the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is accessible to me from my social networks.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree

Name: SMDS4
Description: I never worry about finding information about the coronavirus (COVID-19) from social media.

Name: SMDS5

Name: SMDS7

Name: SMDS9
Description: I share all coronavirus disease (COVID-19) information on social media.

Description: I choose the information related to the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) that I share.

Name: SMDS11
Description: I often rebroadcast information I receive about coronavirus disease (COVID-19).

Name: SMDS12
Description: People on my social networks often receive information related to coronavirus disease (COVID-19) from my account.
Range: 1 = strongly agree; 2 = agree; 3 = neutral; 4 = disagree; 5 = strongly disagree
